name: Sales Pitch Design Deck
overview: Enthought needed to create a standard presentation to use in sales conversations with new potential clients, as a part of an effort to standardize sales processes.
type: Corporate Presentation Design, Informational Design, Graphic Design

name: Event Booth and Collateral Design
overview: The Materials Science team at Enthought wanted to showcase three new AI solutions at an upcoming trade show they were attending. I designed the booth display, brochures for each of the solutions, and banners for promotional emails, and social media posts.
type: Trade Show Booth Design, Brochure Design, Print Design, Social Media Banner Design
